definition: to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
pinyin: zhai4 wu4 dan1 bao3 zheng4 quan4
zi1 chan3 dan1 bao3 zheng4 quan4

sentences.english: Jacob wagered his donkey, he did not bet his ass.
sentences.chinese: 雅各布担保了他的驴子，他并没有打赌他的屁股。

sentences.english: These bonds would also be jointly and severally guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 这类欧元债券还将获得多个国家的联合担保。

sentences.english: Did you ever require a cosigner for a loan?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾经有过一个贷款担保人？

sentences.english: I swear on my honour that I knew nothing about this.
sentences.chinese: 我以人格担保我根本不知道这件事。

sentences.english: If Exposure decreases, the Transferee is obliged to return equivalent Collateral.
sentences.chinese: 当风险敞口降低时，受让人有责任返还相同的担保品。
带有网站担保支付功能。

sentences.english: The company is also overseeing the information assurance development for the networked communications aspects of the project.
sentences.chinese: 该公司也监督该项目的网络通信方面的信息担保开发。

sentences.english: Do you guarantee the bad assets or do you buy them?
sentences.chinese: 你究竟是去担保不良资产还是去买下他们？

sentences.english: This plan indemnifies workers against wages lost through illness.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划为因生病而失去工薪的工人担保。

sentences.english: He gave me a watch as surety .
sentences.chinese: 他给我一块表作为担保。

sentences.english: A bondsman is needed in executing a student loan.
sentences.chinese: 办理助学贷款是需要担保人的。

sentences.english: Analyze reason and countermeasures of responsibility of issuing warrantor.
sentences.chinese: 分析了对开证担保人的担保责任的原因及其对策。

sentences.english: Analyze reason and countermeasures of responsibility of issuing warrantor.
sentences.chinese: 分析了对开证担保人的担保责任的原因及其对策。

sentences.english: Kaifeng Jin Ding Investment and Guarantee Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 这个就是“开封金鼎投资担保有限公司”地英文。

sentences.english: The farmers, having guaranteed not to kill him, the landlord returned.
sentences.chinese: 后来，地主得悉群众担保不杀他，于是决定回村去。

sentences.english: The letter of guarantee should reach us two months before shipment is due, as stipulated in contract.
sentences.chinese: 担保函必须在合同规定的装运期前两个月到达我方。

definition: to provide (an asset) as security for a loan/to put up collateral
to act as surety for sb/to be sb's guarantor/to stand bail for sb
security (property held against a loan)/mortgaged property
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
